comment:
I'd recommend Dr. Shelden to anyone! The whole course went in this order:

Sign up for when you want to do your short speech on a movie, watch the movie in class, lecture/speech day, repeat, midterm paper due, watch the movie in class, lecture/speech day, repeat, and final papers due. Very simple, and very engaging class. Attendance is important!

She knows her stuff veryyy well. I usually zone out while listening to lectures but hers are genuinely very useful and definitely reaches people. Most of her assignments are based on her lectures too, so if you do them on time and watch the lectures, you are guaranteed an A. But the lectures are definitely it for me, THE BEST!! Not even joking.

I adored having professor Shelden. Classes alternate between watching the film of the week and presentations and discussions. This means every other class is just watching a movie. She is extremely caring for students and accessible outside of class. Very encouraging and engaging. I absolutely recommend. Midterm is take-home & class is canceled.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Sheldon is amazing. I've taken her twice already (FILM 3210 & FILM 3240.) Both of these classes offer a good amount of creative freedom. Despite these classes being around 3 hours long, her lectures are VERY engaging. Make sure to take notes it helps tremendously on the tests.

very good professor WOULD 100% take again, discussion are great, weekly readings some very heavy while some arent, weekly quizzes are simple if you read. few papers that allow a lot of creative freedom, she wants everyone to succeed.
Very good professor. allowed three absenses. readings every week can be heavy, but simple. only a couple assignments, do it well and youll get an A. Classes have good discussions.

This was an easy class, even though I hadnt realized it was a mostly english major students class. As long as you prove you read/ or watched and understand the material through your weekly writing paper, you are graded well. I did not do well with participation but still made a good grade. This professor is extremely nice and accomodating.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--So many papers

comment: Dr. Shelden is a great professor. She really cares about the material and her students. She got into an almost fatal car accident and still showed up the next day because she didn't want to miss our presentations. She's teaching and lecturing because its a passion and it shows. I'm taking her again next semester and can't wait!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback

comment: It's an easy A. Firstly, the grading is made up of 4 grades: (midterm, final, essay, presentation). Secondly, the content of the course is to watch an assigned movie, which you will watch with the class and present it the next week. You only do one presentation the whole semester. Thirdly, Dr. Shelden really makes it easy to be interested in class.

I love her class! She's my favorite film professor, so far. There is only one big project where we discuss a film mentioned in the semester. It's not as bad as it sounds, because it really helps with the quizzes and exams. Very discussion heavy styled class. Overall, she's a very fun and caring professor.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Loved her. If you dont like to read consider a different major because the assigned reading can be close to 200 pgs due in a day. She created a theme to the books we read (detective) it was so clever and super interesting! Very thought provoking! we read 5 books a couple short stories and two films. 3 essays and 1 quiz per week over readings
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Dr. Shelden is the most fun and engaging professor I've ever had. She gets everyone interested in the class topic, and helps us narrow down what we want to write for our last paper. Every assignment builds on the next so that your final paper is practically finished by the end, and it's super helpful! Take her class if you can get a spot!

Dr. Shelden is the best professor in the English department. There were only a couple of papers and a weekly small reading response on the novel for each week which was totally doable. Her feedback is extensive and her lectures are a joy. You can really tell she began teaching for the love of it and not for the summers off.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Great proffer! She held my attention for 3hr long lectures, which I thought would be impossible. Responded promptly to emails with great feedback, enjoyed hearing students' ideas, and had some incredible insight on Almodovar's films. I would recommend her to anyone who is willing to put in the work; this class will be rewarding for those who do.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Shelden is wonderful! This was my 2nd time taking her and I loved this film course just as much as the ENGL course I took with her last semester! She assigns alot of reading, but it's well worth it and you will learn a ton. If you get the chance, take Shelden! Especially for a film course! Come to class and you'll pass.

Dr. Shelden is absolutely wonderful. She's whip-smart, articulate, gives extensive feedback on papers, & encourages alternate readings of texts. So long as you back up your claims & do the reading, you'll get an A. She's a little closed off, but professional. I'm taking her again half bc she's a great teacher and half bc she's hot like burning.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: I think Dr. Shelden just assumes that we don't have other responsibilities and homework in our lives. She assigns EXTREMELY irrational reading assignments, such as reading 200 pages between Tuesday to Thursday. She is really nice and she gives really good guidelines for essays. She gives good feedback, too. Just be prepared for a LOT of reading.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Shelden was super helpful and always gave detailed feedback on papers and other assignments. Make sure you read to prep for the quizzes, and be prepared to write a paragraph or two in-class on short notice. Other than that, it's a cool class and if you put the effort in, you'll get an A. Points ARE taken off for every class you miss after 5.

Her feedback on papers is super helpful! She makes the class enjoyable, too. I love the fact that she never puts anyone on the spot, and never makes any student feel as though their opinion is invalid. She keeps the class unbiased and always welcomes new interpretations. Would really recommend!

Love Professor Shelden, if you just take notes on her lectures and make your presentation creative, you'll get an A in her class. Her exams are lengthy, but come straight from her lectures. Would definitely take her again!

LOVED this class. Every other class you watch a film, then talk about it the weeks in between. Discussions were great. She's very funny and easy to talk to. One presentation on a film, a midterm, a paper and a final. I enjoyed going to class. Take notes on lectures because that's where the midtermfinal comes from. Even with that still easy.

Film studies was probably one of my favorite classes this semester. Professor Shelden is a great professor who is very clear about assignments and tests. There are 2 tests and a presentationpaper. I would highly recommend taking her.

Professor Shelden is a decent instructor. She is extremely passionate about the subject she teaches and conveys her enthusiasm very clearly. I real enjoyed reading "satan's FB." BUT, she's intentionally mean, intimidating, and hateful towards her students. I liked the class, but I wish I would have just taken a different professor. Plz steer clear
Dr. Shelden is a fabulous professor that understands the material, while still giving helpful advice for how to become a stronger writer.

Dr. Shelden's 20th Century British Lit was such a great class! I wish I had taken her more than just this once! She picked excellent novels and class discussions were so much fun. I love (what is love?) Dr. Shelden!

Prof. Shelden is very clear about what she expects, but gives enough room for your own opinions. Class discussions were always good and enlightening, she encouraged all of our ideas and was never rude. Im taking her film class next semester.

An alright professor--if you consider someone like that professional. Okay intro class; I wish I would have taken Dr. King. At least then, I would have learned something. Easy class structure. Not a hard grader. But I would not recommend her to anyone.

I recently graduated from KSU, so I feel secure in saying this prof knows her stuff. I do believe, however, that she disrespects her students in the most subtle and rudest of ways. After reading through all of the comments, I def recall her hypocritical narcissism.She treats students in extremely vile ways, yet can't take it when they do the same.
This is a fabulous course! I would recommend it to everyone! The prof is semi-stellar. Dr.Shelden can be a bit much though. He easy grading is rather insulting,but okay.

She's a decent professor.With that said, I would give her a solid 5 on a 10 scale. I really enjoyed her film class this semester because the films are amazing!! She's entertaining and funny, but rude and self-adsorbed at the same time. All in all an easy class with a B- professor.

She's great. Taken her for film, critical theory, and 20th century brit lit. If you like to read and have any interest in furthering insight on those books with class discussion, she's top tier. If you don't, why are you an English major?

Dr. Shelden is one of the worst professors you could ever take.  She makes fun of her students, even though she knows most of them think she highly of her. She isn't brilliant you guys; all she knows is theory. She doesn't care about anyone but herself. She has no respect for other peoples' views and is just downright horrible and completely vain.
Dr. Shelden is a wonderful professor who will assist you in developing your writing skills.  However, be sure you have her review your papers with you prior to submission.

I am not sure if I took the same professor Shelden as the other raters here. She is a fine professor, but she is as cold as ice. She is not one for jokes or laughter. Don't take her class in the hope that she will be your friend.

Best class I have ever taken. I was recommended this class and I will recommend it to anyone. It was so much fun and I learned so much. I have never thought so hard as I did in her class but it was completely worth it. Easy class and SUPER interesting. Plus, you get to watch movies every other class. Literally.

A great teacher that makes you think. The work wasn't hard, mostly reading and a few short papers. Quizzes if the class didn't participate in discussions. I had 1 class with (my last semester). I regret not taking other classes with her. She's brilliant, funny and I could listen to her lecture all day.

Ashley Shelden is the best professor I've had in college thus far. She is brilliant and is a fantastic teacher. She is easy-going, helpful, and funny. Class lectures are always interesting and attendance isn't an issue because you'll never want to miss a class! She is kind and compassionate and a wonderful human-being! Take her class(s) if you can!

Dr. Shelden is amazing. The best professor at KSU! I've taken her three times and wish that I could take her for more classes. Queer Theory is fabulous and so is she! She is brilliant, fun, and energetic.I Love her and all her classes! Take her if you can!!

Weekly quizzes on readings graded very fairly. Midterm paper(4 pgs) and Final paper(8pgs). She is young, fun, extremely intelligent. Her class felt wonderfully like a proper liberal arts, mind-stretching environment. I highly recommend taking her for any course! I earned a high A.

Ms. Shelden is the best professor I have had at KSU! She is very clear about everything she teaches and will meet with students outside of class with any assignment. She is definitely an asset to the university.

Dr. Shelden is Brilliant and amazing! Love her Film Theory II class and her! 2 Tests, 1 presentation, and 2 papers. Will let you re-write the papers. Speaks with clarity and is very organized. Truly cares about her students and is very passionate about the subject. Take Her!! She's great!

I loved Dr Shelden.  Wish I could have taken her for more ENGL classes! Not a big fan of Brit lit BUT loved some of the books she selected.  Quizzes if not enough class discussion, 2 papers and a presentation.  She is funny and not a boring lecturer.  Take if you can!

Dr. Shelden has a really sweet haircut AND she's a great teacher. She explains difficult concepts in a very clear, and organized manner, and values any well-developed analysis as long as the text supports it. She chose engaging and challenging works, and allowed us freedom in our papers--she respects her students' intelligence. TAKE HER CLASSES.

Dr.Shelden is one of the best English professors at KSU. I have taken her for both Film 3210 and Engl 4570. She's Brilliant, funny, nice, easy to work with and big on class discussions. I love her!! She is without a doubt an asset to KSU! Take her if you can!

Dr.Shelden is amazing!! I took her for Film 3210 and Engl 4570. She is very big on class discussion and lets everyone have a chance to talk. If there is no class discussion then she will give quizzes to make sure that everyone has read. She is one of the best English professor at KSU! She's BRILLIANT, nice, funny, helpful. Love her! Took her 3x!

Very engaging and helpful professor. This class was almost entirely discussion-oriented, which is the kind of class I enjoy. Did not really use the book so I wish I hadn't bought it. She does expect you to think, and those who don't participate don't do as well. Everything on the tests is what we talk about in class.

Great professor who is always prepared. Leads excellent discussions and gets you involved. The concepts can be challenging at times, but she is willing to expand on them. She makes compelling arguments and connections to readings and Films.

Handsdown 1 of the best profs I've EVER HAD! Class discussions are interesting-she's always willing 2 repeat ideas&concepts & the tests&essays are easy. She was always considerate of other's opinions & asked where they came up with it if different from hers. Attendance & participation are mandatory, but you are paying so you should go. She's Great!
I love Dr. Shelden! Without a doubt one of the nicest and most helpful professors I've taken. Class discussions are never boring, even if you didn't like what you read.

I graduated from film school before coming to Kennesaw State, and she's the best film teacher I've ever had. You will work and the reading is pretty dense, but she's entertaining, very intelligent, and works hard to make sure every student has a say in the discussion and understands the key concepts. Not a gimmee teacher, but you'll learn.

I don't think I've ever enjoyed a Brit Lit class more than this since I entered college. She was an amazing teacher and I think if you have a chance to take her Brit Lit class you should! She's definately not an easy teacher, but she gives plenty of opportunity for help should you need it!

rrrreally hated her brit. lit. class. she made no sense at all...the stuff she came up with was just rediculous. but if you try to make your own opinion separate from hers you're wrong. i feel like i dont know any more about brit. lit. than i did going into the class. it was just painful

ok there are several things you got to watch out for this teacher. if you leave early she marks you late, she grades pretty harshly, and talks to impress herself. attendance is mandatory and you have to talk in class. if you don't or say something she thinks is stupid, she won't like you. so many books are required and used so good luck with her.

Don't sit in the back of the class, sit in the front and participate it will truly help your grade!! We read 10 books in class and wrote two essays.  Read the books and talk to the professor she will help.  The class is very interactive where we all talked about the readings.  She is very passionate and brings this out in her students.
Dr. Shelden is the BEST professor that I've ever had. I recommend her to all of my friends, and if you ever get a chance to take one of her film or English classes, do not miss the opportunity!

A wonderful professor to take. She made the class interesting and helped me to really understand ideas within literature. My only regret is that I didn't talk more during class and I probably won't be able to take her again. Gives almost a month to work on essays.
This class was pretty hard for me but she is a cool teacher.  The final paper was a difficult concept to grasp.

Dr.Shelden is an amazing teacher and honestly the best one I've had throughout college. She does a lot of reading out of the book and it is a pure discussion class, but it's a great class to be a part of. Even if you don't like discussion you will by the end of the class. Taking her again for two classes next semester. Love her/love the class.
No Comments

Professor Shelden is awesome!!! She's articulate and nice, and really funny at the same time. Warning: She REALLY expects you to talk in class. If you do and she feels the class is having a good discussion, then NO QUIZZES. She only requires 2 papers and a final that comes from class discussions. Attendance isn't mandatory, but COME anyway!
